entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:14 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 9:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 7:09 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 33.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:09 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:09 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
